content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia using Regex, String

function extract_julia_code(md::AbstractString)
 triple_backtick = r"```{3}"
 triple_tilde = r"~~~{3}"
 code_block_pattern = union(triple_backtick, triple_tilde) .| Regex("```(.+?)\n")
 all_code_blocks = matchall(code_block_pattern, md)

 extracted_codes = String[]
 current_code = String()
 for code in all_code_blocks.match
 if !isempty(current_code)
 push!(extracted_codes, current_code * "\n" * code.match[1])
 current_code = String()
 else
 current_code = code.match[1]
 end
 end

 isempty(current_code) && pushfirst!(extracted_codes, current_code)

 join_codes = join(extracted_codes, "\n\n")
 return join_codes
end
```
